column2: geom_linerange(mapping = aes(ymin = summary_post_df_focus_from_vague$post_q05, ymax = summary_post_df_focus_from_vague$post_q95, group = player_id), position = position_dodge(0.2)) +
geom_point(mapping = aes(y = summary_post_df_focus_from_vague$post_avg, color = "post_avg", group = player_id), position = position_dodge(0.2)) +
geom_point(mapping = aes(y = summary_post_df_focus_from_vague$num_events / summary_post_df_focus_from_vague$num_trials, color = "MLEs", group = player_id), position = position_dodge(0.2))
